author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two panchayat presidents have been booked for embezzlement of funds and forgery here in Uthangarai.

The president of Nayakannur Panchayat Muthumanikam and vice-president Tamizharasi were found to have embezzled funds that were allocated for Green House Scheme by Uthangarai Block Development Office.

According to a complaint by Uthangarai BDO Tamilarasan, an inquiry into the funds had revealed that the accused Muthumanikam and Tamizharasi had embezzled funds to the tune of Rs.30.65 lakh under various heads. Following this, vice-president Tamizharasi was arrested and police are on the lookout for Muthumanikam, who is currently absconding.

Forgery

Similarly, the president of Athipaadi Panchayat has been booked for forgery and siphoning of Panchayat funds here.

The accused Moorthy had forged the signatures of former Uthangarai BDO and the incumbent BDO and had siphoned off funds to the tune of Rs.11.88 lakh. Based on a complaint, Moorthy was booked. Police are on lookout for the man, who is at large
title: Case against two panchayat presidents
